oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The !khau (a lizard of the genus Agama), which interferes with the coming of the rain-clouds. Springbok hunting follows the rain. (L VIII.-3. 6232 rev.-6234 rev., 6259-6266, 6269-6271). !khau, kochelman !khau
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The !khau lizard and the rainclouds - springbok hunting follows rain; and the song of the !khau lizard
